title: Dark Mode & Theme Customization System Launch
summary: Major theming overhaul introduces dark mode support, CSS custom properties, and flexible theme customization API for diverse design requirements.
author: Alex A11y
content:
Today we're launching the most requested feature - comprehensive dark mode support and a powerful theme customization system!

**Dark Mode Features:**
â€¢ Automatic system preference detection
â€¢ Manual theme switching with persistent storage
â€¢ Smooth transitions between light and dark modes
â€¢ High contrast mode support for accessibility
â€¢ Custom color palette generation

**Theme Customization:**
â€¢ CSS custom properties for runtime theme changes
â€¢ JSON-based theme configuration
â€¢ Component-level theme overrides
â€¢ Typography scale customization
â€¢ Spacing and border radius tokens

**Developer Experience:**
â€¢ Theme preview in Storybook documentation
â€¢ TypeScript support for theme objects
â€¢ Build-time theme validation
â€¢ Hot reload for theme changes during development

**Breaking Changes:**
â€¢ Legacy theme API deprecated (migration guide available)
â€¢ Some CSS class names updated for consistency
â€¢ Minimum React version now 16.8+ (hooks required)

**Migration Guide:**
We've created a comprehensive migration guide and automated migration scripts to help upgrade existing projects.

**Example Usage:**
```jsx
import { createTheme, ThemeProvider } from '@example/project-b';

const customTheme = createTheme({
  colors: {
    primary: '#6366f1',
    background: '#1f2937'
  },
  typography: {
    fontFamily: 'Inter, sans-serif'
  }
});

<ThemeProvider theme={customTheme}>
  <App />
</ThemeProvider>
```
